name: Centraal Bureau Levensmiddelenhandel (CBL)
membership: CBL is an active member of EuroCommerce.
goal:
The Dutch Food Retail Association represents the Dutch supermarket organisations and food service companies. CBL represents members on all non-commercial issues such as food safety, sustainability, health issues, crime/theft, logistics and staff-training.

CBL has 27 members which includes almost 4300 stores and 300.000 employees.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Home Affairs, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Regulation 1169/2011, Regulation on official controls (2013/0140(COD)), regulation EG 517/2014, REFIT Claims direction. EU Platform on Food losses and Waste
